@heath I need your help with this one. I think it needs to be setup like thermacell and I don't have their email details.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hello,

We have customers on the bugzapperlamps advising they are not receiving the email order confirmation. We had this issue on Thermacell in December, which Heath sorted out - SMTP update. See attached email for reference.

Below is the customer order that didn't get received. I have resent it to him now. Can we please investigate as to why the order confirmation isn't working on this website.



Thanks,
Rosemary

Rosemary​​​​ Murphy
Marketing Communications Manager
